characters.name: Izuku Midoriya
characters.quirk_japanese: ワン・フォー・オール
characters.quirk_description: A transferable Quirk that stockpiles power and grants immense strength, speed, stamina, and durability.

characters.name: Katsuki Bakugo
characters.quirk_description: Secretes sweat with nitroglycerin-like properties from his hands and can ignite it on command to produce powerful explosions.

characters.name: Ochaco Uraraka
characters.quirk_description: She can make any object weightless by touching them with the pads on her fingertips. Overuse of her Quirk will cause her to suffer from severe nausea.

characters.name: Tenya Ida
characters.quirk_description: Super speed and superhuman kicking strength via jet engines in his calves

characters.name: Shoto Todoroki
characters.quirk_description: Enables him to generate ice from the right side of his body and fire from the left
